message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split.
I think I deserve a bit more, considering the inflation hits you harder.
The inflation is working against both of us, Bob. I'll take a slight hit from my original offer, but let's close this deal before it gets any worse.
Inflation is indeed taking its toll, but I still think I can get a better deal. This is my new proposal.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  Let's just split it evenly and call it a day before we both lose even more to inflation.
